data.name: Anti Frank's Wrath
data.detailed_description:
Anti Frank is unleashing his wrath on the universe! Play by yourself or with a few friends locally to take down hoards of zombies and stop Anti Frank! Play as one of four unique characters and buy new upgrades and weapons as you rid the universe of zombies.

Anti Frank's Wrath is a top-down arcade shoot-em up based in the futuristic 1980's. It supports 4 player local co-op (or steam remote play).

data.short_description: Anti Frank is unleashing his wrath on the universe! Play by yourself or with a few friends locally to take down hoards of zombies and stop Anti Frank! Play as one of four unique characters and buy new upgrades and weapons as you rid the universe of zombies.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Greater
  • Processor: Pentium Gold G5400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 1030
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Greater
  • Processor: i5 9400F
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 or Greater
